Pre-Game Insights: West Indies and South Africa face off in a crucial match for advancement in the T20 World Cup.
The winner will secure a spot in the final four, while the loser is eliminated.
South Africa has a perfect record of 6 wins out of 6, while West Indies is also unbeaten in the group stage.
Shai Hope's performance against USA may influence West Indies' batting lineup decisions.
South Africa may consider their spinners against West Indies, potentially including Bjorn Fortuin or Tabraiz Shamsi.
The match is significant for both teams, with West Indies aiming to reclaim their dominance and South Africa seeking their first T20 World Cup win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is at North Sound, Antigua, with potential weather concerns due to a 17% rain probability.
Historical head-to-head statistics show South Africa leading with three wins out of four meetings in T20 World Cups.
West Indies have scored the highest total in the tournament with 218 runs against Afghanistan.
